msg_history.text:
Task 3

TSL Capsule Time-Sustainability-Leadership - Write a letter requesting the universe, decorate it, write your name and date, and bury it in the ground in the capsule (small box, glass bottle and even in a flower pot). Remember: you plant hopes, expectations Dreams and the universe will grow them, define exactly what you want and when. Note: It is also possible to forward the letter to a close person, such as a teacher or friend, who will keep a letter and return it to you a year later. | ✨

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: ✨

Task 2

Plant a tree or donate to a body that promotes tree planting in your area. Take a picture or film yourself and capture the magic. | 🌱

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🌱

Task 1

Watch the TED talk - How trees talk to each other | Suzanne Simard | & reflect on what you saw and share in the discussion group something new that you learned. https://youtu.be/Un2yBgIAxYs | 🐮

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🐮

💥💥💥 Bonus 💥💥💥

   Players from the same team that will upload a shared video within the next 24 hours, on one of the goals you have been exposed to so far, will recieve bonus points.

* It is possible that one will be in front of the camera and the other will write, produce and accompany.

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🚣‍♀

Task 3

Sharing is caring - Today's task and until the end of the challenge is to share the challenge with friends, even 3 people each day are enough, although the more you share with more people the more powerful the energy in my eyes. Remember to share, experiences, impressions, what you learned new and so on. The mark for sharing is emoji 🐜 

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🐜

Task 2

Watch the TED talk - How empowering women and girls can help stop global warming | Katharine Wilkinson. A magical evening full of sustainability, leadership and passing on the good 👣 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXlJEcrinwg | Ages 8+

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 👣

Task 1

Watch the TED talk - How empowering women and girls can help stop global warming | Katharine Wilkinson. A magical evening full of sustainability, leadership and passing on the good  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXlJEcrinwg and share in the discussion group something new that you learned | 🌍

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🌍

Task 4

Bonus task: Share with the group a video about an organization from your city / country that deals with Sustainable Cities & Communities.

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🇹🇯

Task 3

Letter to the mayor - Write a letter to your mayor, stating everything you want to change in the city. You are of course welcome to share with the group what you have written and even send it to your city mayor. | 📧

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 📧

Task 2

Invent new environmental symbols - Can you produce future environmental symbols / logos? and what about a personal symbol that is all you? Show the symbol you created to friends and try to see if they can understand what you meant. Were they able to understand? Wonderful. Did not succeed? Modify the icons so that they are more understandable, and show them again. | 🏕

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🏕

Task 1

Watch the TED talk - 7 principles for building better cities | Peter Calthorpe| & reflect on what you saw and share in the discussion group something new that you learned. https://youtu.be/IFjD3NMv6Kw | 🏡

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🏡

Task 4

Section 4 - In the challenge of 3 tasks daily - this is an innovation J From today until the end of the challenge, write down 3 new ideas in your notebook every day, mark 📡  | Ages 8+

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🇧🇯

Task 3

Digital pacifier - 1 hour mobile diet task - you must close/shut down your mobile phone for a continuous period of only 1 hour, during the day -each day, from today until the end of the challenge. If you selected this task, mark group 📱 daily. | Ages 8+

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 📱

Task 2

Aliens visiting Earth - Imagine that aliens from a planet named Ting have landed at your house and they offer you three wishes to renew things in your life and three more wishes to renew things in your country - what would you renew ??  | 👽

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 👽

Task 1

Watch the TED talk - The next manufacturing revolution is here | Olivier Scalabre| & reflect on what you saw and share in the discussion group something new that you learned. https://youtu.be/AyWtIwwEgS0| 🔧

After completing this task, please send this emoji in the group: 🔧
